main event: Observers reported seeing five bright white lights in the sky rotating around a central light on March 1, 1967.
interesting points: The lights were described as bright white and appeared to rotate around a central light,The sighting lasted for a certain duration, with the object in view continuously for the entire time,The lights disappeared by getting bright then vanishing,No photographs were included in the report despite being from a Project Blue Book document,The observer described seeing the lights as low flying and larger than an average aircraft.
sighted object: five bright white lights in the sky
witness description: A 13-year-old male who noticed the object while outdoors.
